long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Capybara clicker unblocked


The guide for beginners playing Capybara Clicker
At first glance, this game offers everything fans of idle games could wish for. Not only does it have simple controls, but it also has addictive gameplay that will keep players hooked for hours.
As you can see, a yellow capybara is in the center of the screen. All you have to do is tap on this Capybara to create more capybaras. Since you aim to create a capybara galaxy, you should not hesitate to tap the Capybara constantly to make as many capybaras as possible. Also, pay attention to the energy bar on the left side of the screen. When it is complete, the number of capybaras is doubled. So do not let this bar become empty. Also, sometimes, a tiny capybara appears and floats around the screen. You have to tap it to get a point before it disappears again. The more capybaras you earn, the faster you can expand your capybara empire.

Controls: Click the left mouse button or tap directly on the screen to produce more capybaras.

All upgrades in Capybara Clicker
Unlocking upgrades is another essential task when creating a Capybara galaxy. You need to unlock 16 upgrades, each offering a specific advantage. At the beginning, all upgrades are locked. They are only unlocked as you progress through the game. Once unlocked, you can buy them. Here is the list of all enhancements, their functions, and some tips on unlocking them.

Cursor upgrades
The first type of upgrade is the cursor upgrade, which improves your click efficiency and automates your Capybara'syour Capybaraoduction process to seven cursor upgrades in this game.

Cursor: This upgrade is unlocked after you have produced 50 capybaras. If you want to increase the number of capybaras per click, you should buy this upgrade.
Automatic click: To unlock this upgrade, earn 125 capybaras. It helps you automatically click on the giant Capybara when offline.
Mr Clicker: To unlock this upgrade, you should try to earn 500 capybaras. It helps to increase five capybaras per click.
President Clicker: To unlock this upgrade, you must earn up to 12,000 capybaras. The number of capybaras you earn with each click will increase by 100 after you purchase this upgrade.
King Clicker: This upgrade will be unlocked if you earn 90,000 capybaras. It grants 1000 capybaras for each click.
The next upgrade is the Emperor Clicker, which can be unlocked with 22 million capybaras. If you buy it, the number of capybaras you receive with each click increases by 9000.
Pope Clicker: You must collect 300 million capybaras to unlock this upgrade. This increases the number of capybaras you earn with each click by 25,000.
God Clicker: You need 1.8 billion capybaras to unlock this upgrade. This is also one of the best cursor upgrades because it helps increase the number of capybaras you earn with each click by 100,000.
